description: hat with small extensions at ears; wool tassel at top and ends of extensions; braided tassels at center back; multicolored textiles of various designs quilted in lengthwise stripes on top half of hat, chevron design on bottom and sides; four strips of embroidery mark quadrants of top of hat; motifs triangles and "X"; zigzag row of braided yarn between top and bottom halves of hat; chain stitch embroidery near bottom edge; woven red strip attached to bottom edge
title: Hat
